survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used subscription-based meal kit services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users based on their experience with the service. Ensure answer options cover all relevant timeframes.

script.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify key drivers of customer choice. Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant factors.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this meal kit service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This question measures net promoter score (NPS) potential. Keep the options simple and clear.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this meal kit service to a friend or colleague?
